attributes.action: Post match discipline action for cheating footballers
attributes.additional_details: I wish to introduce post match discipline action for professional footballers who cheat and bring the game into disrepute, This includes diving and deliberate cheating to get other players sent off or to gain an unfair advantage. Football needs to be cleaned up to promote our youth into playing more sport, FAIRLY

rejection.details: Regulation of football is a matter for the FA in England and the SFA in Scotland.
